newsitem.title: CANADA: Canada dlr ends much softer in sporadic trading.
newsitem.headline: Canada dlr ends much softer in sporadic trading.

text.p: * The Canadian dollar weakened on Wednesday past key support at C$1.3440 (US$0.7440) to close at C$1.3470 (US$0.7424) from Tuesday's close at C$1.3425 (US$0.7449), dealers said. * They said trading was sporadic, with one large order to sell Canada starting the weaker trend around midday.
The currency is expected to weaken toward the end of the week, but there is a strong corporate interest to buy the Canadian dollar at C$1.3500 (US$0.7408), dealers said.
On the crosses, the Canadian dollar eased to 1.1325 marks from 1.1350 marks on Tuesday and rose slightly to 83.95 yen from 83.75 yen.
